title: Dialogflow - Dialogflow Web Demo
abstract:
# Dialogflow - Dialogflow Web Demo
Dialogflow Web Demo provides a simple text chat user interface for your agent. For more information, see the [quickstart guide](/dialogflow/docs/quick/integration) for this integration.
content:
## Limitations
This integration only supports single text responses. Rich messages (including sequential text responses, line breaks, hyperlinks, images etc) are not supported.
To use [rich response messages](/dialogflow/docs/intents-rich-messages) and customizations, see the [Dialogflow Messenger](/dialogflow/docs/integrations/dialogflow-messenger) integration.
Only the [default agent language](/dialogflow/es/docs/agents-settings#lang) is supported by this integration.
